docs.lead_paragraph: -SUIT SEASON IS dieting season. With figure problems uncloaked each summer, hundreds of thousands of Americans take cover under the jackets of diet books in an attempt to streamline their proportions. While many people will lose weight, most will not keep it off. Some will will even gain back more than they started with and become more frustrated than ever.
